notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: O.M. and A.A. conceived the study. O.M., M.S. and F.C. carried out the data analysis, and conducted the experiment. M.S. developed the copula package used in the study. M.S. updated the copula package to incorporate new fitting metrics. O.M., M.S. and F.C. contributed to the development of the code. O.M. prepared the first draft. O.M., M.S., F.C. and A.A. contributed to the discussion and interpretation of the results. O.M., M.S., F.C. and A.A. responded to reviewer comments. All authors reviewed and commented on the paper.
